เส้นเวลาข้อเสนอ EIP สำหรับการอัพเกรด Hegota

Hegota Upgrade EIP Proposal Timelines

12/22/2025//Ethereum Blog
general
AI

Summary

TH

ได้ประกาศเส้นเวลาสำหรับการอัปเกรด Hegota ของ Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs) โดยใช้วิธีการแบบหลายขั้นตอนสำหรับการส่งและอภิปรายคุณลักษณ์สำคัญและรอง ตั้งแต่วันที่ 8 มกราคมถึง 4 กุมภาพันธ์ นักพัฒนาสามารถส่ง 'headliner proposals' ไปยัง Ethereum Magicians forum โดยใช้เทมเพลตที่กำหนดซึ่งต้องอธิบายเหตุผล ประเมผลกระทบ การประเมินด้านเทคนิค และมีผู้สนับสนุนที่ระบุตัวตน หลังจากนั้น ตั้งแต่วันที่ 5 ถึง 26 กุมภาพันธ์ ชุมชน Ethereum จะอภิปรายข้อเสนอเหล่านี้ระหว่าง All Core Dev calls โดยยินยอมให้รับฟังความคิดเห็นของชุมชนผ่าน forum หลังจากที่ headliner ได้รับการยืนยันจะมีช่วงเวลา 30 วันสำหรับการส่ง non-headliner EIPs ข้อเสนอ FOCIL กำลังพิจารณาอยู่เนื่องจากได้ถูกกล่าวถึงก่อนหน้านี้สำหรับ Glamsterdam แต่ถูกเลื่อนออกไป

EN

The Hegota upgrade timeline for Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs) has been announced, with a phased approach for submitting and discussing major and minor features. From January 8th to February 4th, developers can submit 'headliner' proposals to the Ethereum Magicians forum using a specific template that requires justification, impact assessment, technical evaluation, and a designated champion. Following this period, from February 5th to 26th, the Ethereum community will deliberate on these proposals during All Core Dev calls, with community input welcomed through the forum. After the headliner is finalized, there will be a 30-day window for submitting non-headliner EIPs. The FOCIL proposal is already being considered as it was previously discussed for Glamsterdam but deferred.

Key Points

  • Hegota upgrade has a specific timeline for EIP proposals: Jan 8-Feb 4 for headliners, Feb 5-Feb 26 for discussion, and 30-day window for non-headliners
  • Headliner proposals must use a template and include justification, impact assessment, technical evaluation, and a champion
  • The FOCIL proposal is already under consideration after being deferred from the Glamsterdam upgrade
  • Community input is encouraged through the Ethereum Magicians forum
  • The latest timeline can be tracked on Forkcast

Article

Fusaka shipped PeerDAS in addition to a myriad of minor features and Glamsterdam’s major features will include Block-level Access Lists and enshrined Proposer-Builder Separation. Now we begin outlining the subsequent upgrade: Hegotá . Timeline Jan 8th - Feb 4th : Headliner proposals ( EthMag ) Feb 5th - Feb 26th *: Headliner discussion & finalization ( ACD calls ) 30-day window to follow : Non-headliner EIP proposals ( Hegota Meta EIP ) * subject to change Headliner proposals Hegota’s major features (” headliners ”) will be chosen first. These features, presented as EIPs, can be submitted on the Ethereum Magicians forum beginning January 8th , using a template that will be posted in the EIP Meta thread . This template will ask authors to justify the feature’s inclusion, assess its positive and negative impact on users, evaluate its technical readiness, and designate a champion for the EIP. The champion serves as a point-of-contact and is responsible for making progress on technical feedback. For previous examples, see the Resources section at the bottom of this post. Proposals must be submitted by the February 4th deadline and presented at an All Core Devs call to be considered. Once presented, a proposal is moved to Proposed status by the champion opening a pull request against the Meta EIP , placing the EIP in the “Proposed for Inclusion” section. One headliner, FOCIL , already appears in the Considered section; it was previously discussed for inclusion in the Glamsterdam upgrade and later deferred as part of a scope-reduction decision. It is included here to reflect that prior discussion and ongoing interest. Headliner discussion & finalization The following ~four All Core Dev calls will then be used to deliberate between proposals. Assessment is generally around need and urgency for Ethereum and its users and the complexity and security considerations of implementing the change. The Ethereum community is invited to voice their opinions on these proposals via the Ethereum Magicians forum - a community feedback template will be posted when this period is open. Non-headliner EIP proposals Once the headliner is chosen, there will then be a 30-day window to propose minor features (”non-headliners”). These are proposed by opening a pull request during that time window against the Meta EIP , placing the EIP in the “Proposed for Inclusion” section. The latest version of the timeline can be followed on Forkcast . Those interested in following the tentative technical schedule can visit the Forkcast schedule page. Resources Network Upgrade Inclusion Stages EIP (EIP-7723) Motivation behind the headliner process (EthMag) Hegota Meta EIP (EIP-8081) Hegota headliner process - template to be added here (EthMag) Glamsterdam Meta EIP (EIP-7773) Glamsterdam headliner process & template (EthMag) Glamsterdam community feedback template (EthMag)
